metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2727 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Users may be able to launch containers using images that are restricted by ImagePolicyWebhook when using ephemeral containers. Kubernetes clusters are only affected if the ImagePolicyWebhook admission plugin is used together with ephemeral containers.

notes.Note: leosilva> kubernates is in fact a kubernetes installer that calls snap, not the package it self.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
